description.english: Have the Tiqqun's hull integrity erode below 5% and survive

description.spanish: Ten un observatorio en cada sector
description.schinese: 每个区域都有一个天文台
description.japanese: 各セクターに展望台を設置する
description.italian: Aggiungi un osservatorio in ogni settore

description.english: Have a Train Station in each of the six sectors
description.german: Unterhalte einen Bahnhof in jedem Sektor.
description.french: Disposez d'une gare dans chaque secteur.
description.spanish: Ten una estación de tren en cada sector
description.schinese: 每个区域都有一个火车站
description.japanese: 各セクターに駅を設置する
description.italian: Aggiungi una stazione ferroviaria in ogni settore

description.english: Build an Exo-fighting Dome
description.german: Baue eine Exo-Kampfkuppel.
description.french: Construisez un Dôme d'Exo-combat
description.spanish: Construye una Cúpula de Exopelea
description.schinese: 建造一个外部战斗穹顶
description.japanese: EXOファイティングドームを設置する
description.italian: Costruisci una Cupola per combattimenti Exo

description.english: Build a Health Center
description.german: Baue ein Gesundheitszentrum.
description.french: Construisez un Centre de Soin
description.spanish: Construye un centro de salud
description.schinese: 建造一个医疗中心
description.japanese: 医療センターを設置する
description.italian: Costruisci un centro sanitario

description.english: Have 5 accidents within a single cycle
description.german: Erlebe 5 Unfälle in einem einzigen Zyklus.
description.french: Avoir 5 accidents en un seul cycle
description.spanish: Haz que se produzcan 5 accidentes en un solo ciclo
description.schinese: 在一个周期内发生5起事故
description.japanese: 5件/暦以上の事故を起こす
description.italian: Vivi 5 incidenti in un singolo ciclo

description.english: Transfer 300 resources between sectors in a single cycle
description.german: Transferiere in einem einzigen Zyklus 300 Ressourcen zwischen Sektoren.
description.french: Transférez 300 ressources entre secteurs en un seul cycle
description.spanish: Transfiere 300 recursos entre sectores en un solo ciclo
description.schinese: 在一个周期内在区域间转移300单位资源
description.russian: Переместите 300 ед. ресурсов из одного сектора в другой за один цикл
description.japanese: 300ユニット/暦の資源を部門間で移動させる
description.italian: Trasferisci 300 risorse tra i settori in un singolo ciclo

description.english: Have 5 Mining Ships active at the same time
description.german: Unterhalte gleichzeitig 5 aktive Bergbauschiffe.
description.french: Avoir 5 vaisseaux miniers actifs en même temps
description.spanish: Ten 5 naves mineras activas al mismo tiempo
description.schinese: 同时有5艘采矿船在工作
description.japanese: 同時に5隻の採掘船を有効にする
description.italian: Tieni attive 5 navi minerarie contemporaneamente

description.english: Replace the last original piece of hull through EVA repairs
description.german: Ersetze das letzte Originalteil des Rumpfes durch Außenbord-Reparaturen.
description.french: Remplacer le dernier morceau de coque d'origine par des réparations EVA.
description.koreana: EVA 수리를 통해 선체의 마지막 기존 조각 교체하기
description.spanish: Sustituye la última pieza original del casco con reparaciones EVA
description.schinese: 通过舱外活动气闸的维修更换掉最后一块原始的船体
description.russian: Замените последнюю оригинальную деталь корпуса, ремонтируя его через шлюз для ВКД
description.japanese: EVA修理で船体の全ての部品を交換する
description.italian: Sostituisci l'ultimo pezzo originale dello scafo tramite riparazioni EVA

description.english: Have every single sector in a work status of at least "Overwork"
description.german: Unterhalte in allen Sektoren mindestens den Arbeitsstatus „Überstunden“.
description.french: Avoir chaque secteur dans un état de travail au mieux en surmenage
description.koreana: 모든 구역마다 ‘과로’ 작업 상태 이상 도달하기
description.spanish: Haz que todos los sectores tengan un estado de «Exceso de trabajo» o superior
description.schinese: 使每个区域的工作状态至少为“过劳”
description.russian: Рабочий статус каждого сектора — «Переутомление» или хуже
description.japanese: すべての部門を「過労」以上の状態にする
description.italian: Fai in modo che ogni singolo settore abbia un livello di condizioni di lavoro pari almeno a

description.english: Reduce all audio sliders to 0 in the settings menu
description.german: Reduziere alle Audio-Regler im Einstellungsmenü auf 0.
description.french: Réduisez tous les curseurs audio à 0 dans le menu des paramètres
description.koreana: 설정 메뉴에서 모든 오디오 슬라이더를 0으로 줄이기
description.spanish: Pon a 0 todas las barras de audio del menú Ajustes
description.schinese: 在设置菜单中将所有音频滑块调至0
description.russian: Поставьте весь звук на 0 в настройках игры
description.japanese: オーディオの設定をすべて0にする
description.italian: Riduci tutti i cursori audio a 0 nel menu delle impostazioni

description.english: Have a Water Treatment Center in a sector with the Body Recycling decree in effect
description.german: Aktiviere die Wasseraufbereitung in einem Sektor, während das Leichenverwertungsdekret aktiv ist.
description.french: Activez une Station de lyophilisationdans dans un secteur où la politique de recyclage des corps est en vigueur.
description.koreana: 시신 재활용 법령 시행 중에 구역 내 물 처리 시설 가동하기
description.spanish: Activa un centro de tratamiento del agua en un sector donde el decreto de reciclaje de cadáveres esté en vigor
description.schinese: 在回收尸体法令生效期间，在一个区域内激活一个水处理中心
description.russian: Активируйте центр водоочистки в секторе, где действует указ о переработке тел
description.japanese: 死体をリサイクルしているセクターで水処理センターを稼働させる
description.italian: Attiva un centro di trattamento dell'acqua in un settore con direttiva di riciclaggio dei cadaveri in vigore

displayName.french: De la part du membre oublié
displayName.japanese: 忘れられた者たちのために

description.german: Führe dreimal das Naomi-Protokoll aus.

description.schinese: 执行3次娜奥米协议
description.japanese: ナオミプロトコルを3回実施する
description.italian: Implementa il protocollo Naomi 3 volte

description.english: Complete Challenge mode
description.german: Schließe den Herausforderungsmodus ab
description.french: Terminez le mode Épreuve
description.spanish: Completa el modo Reto
description.schinese: 完成挑战模式
description.japanese: チャレンジモードをクリアする
description.italian: Completa la modalità Sfida
